metadata.title: CVE-2017-7875 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In wallpaper.c in feh before v2.18.3, if a malicious client pretends to bethe E17 window manager, it is possible to trigger an out-of-boundary heapwrite while receiving an IPC message. An integer overflow leads to a bufferoverflow and/or a double free.

criterions.comment: feh: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
